title: Ian Blad
text:
4698738496

ianblad@gmail.com | www.linkedin.com/in/ianblad





Brigham Young University - Idaho Rexburg, Idaho
• Gained foundational knowledge in organizational behavior, and personnel selection • Conducted multiple extensive literature reviews in belonging, retention, the OCEAN personality model and cognitive dissonance. • Developed strong research skills through coursework in statistics, experimental design, and data analysis forming Data Science Minor and a Statistics Certificate • Mastered skills in Statistical analysis, R, Python, SQL, Microsoft Excel, PowerPoint, Word and GitHub






HydroMax USA Flower Mound, Texas • Created an automated employee evaluation system projected to save hundreds of management hours yearly • Executed multiple analysis in employee turnover, recruiter effectiveness and industry standards in HR metrics using R and Python tools



Church Of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints Scotland / Ireland • Trained several teams sized from 8-30 people every few months • Gave presentations and taught skills weekly, and promoted well-being in various leadership positions






BYUI Data Science Society Rexburg, Idaho • Created a web scraper to retrieve data on MILB games relevant to attendance and promotions • Utilized statistical tools such as ANOVA testing and multiple adjustments to gain insights predicted to dramatically increase attendance



Entrepreneurial Rexburg, Idaho • Designing agentic AI and web scraper, will automate job of a drafter in septic design process • Aiming to reduce a 7 hour work process to a 30 minute process



Brigham Young University Idaho Rexburg, Idaho • Conducted literature review with faculty members on student belonging / retention • Findings will support a university-wide initiative to improve inclusion and engagement
